Home How To Courses Answers Search Sonic Coupons Tweet Are you looking for Sonic Drive-In coupons ? Sonic is a fast food and drive-in restaurant with locations across the country. They have an extensive menu with a variety of breakfast and lunch items, and offer more than just traditional burgers and fries. http://www.sonicdrivein.com/menu/sections.do They also have many unique flavors of ice cream drinks. This site will direct you to coupons and other special promotions that will help you save some money on your next visit to your local Sonic.
Where to Get Sonic Coupons
Sonic frequently issues coupons for discounts on food and drink items. These coupons are often found on third-party websites such as Saving Cents with Sense and Campus Food , and are printable. You may use them at any participating Sonic Drive-In location, as long as they are redeemed before the expiration date. Sonic also regularly runs promotional specials that do not require any coupon printing or clipping. These deals are generally advertised, and may be listed in the links below along with printable coupons.
Regular visitors to Sonic Drive-In can benefit from the rewards of the Sonic Cruisers club, which is the official fan club of Sonic. Members receive special rewards in their email inboxes, as well as gifts on their birthdays and updates on any other sales and events. You may also choose to sign up for a My Sonic card , which will enable you to earn rewards such as free food (you do not need to be a member of Sonic Cruisers to get a My Sonic card, but you will earn a special treat if you are). To sign up for Sonic Cruisers, visit the official Sonic Drive-In website, and click on Sonic Cruisers at the top portion of the page. You will need to enter your first and last name, address, city, state, zip code, birthday, email address and password. If you already have a My Sonic card, you may enter the number to receive your special treat. http://www.sonicdrivein.com/login/cruisers.jsp
